name: gesundheit
description: Concise SQL generation for Postgres and MySQL
author: Stephen Sugden <glurgle@gmail.com> (http://www.betsmartmedia.com)

scripts.compile: rm -fr lib && coffee -o lib -bc src && cp src/sql_keywords.txt lib/ && browserify -s gesundheit lib/index.js > gesundheit-standalone.js && cp gesundheit-standalone.js doc/_static/
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run unit-test && npm run integration-test
scripts.integration-test: npm run init-mysql && npm run init-postgres && tap test/integration
scripts.prepare-release: npm run compile && npm test && npm run build-doc && npm run commit-pages
scripts.commit-pages: OLD_HEAD=`git describe --contains --all HEAD` && git checkout gh-pages && cp -R doc/_build/html/ ./ && git commit -a -m v$npm_package_version && git checkout $OLD_HEAD
scripts.build-docs: npm run compile && make -C doc html
scripts.init-mysql: mysql -u root -e 'drop database if exists gesundheit_test' && mysql -u root -e 'create database gesundheit_test'
scripts.init-postgres: psql -U postgres -c 'drop database if exists gesundheit_test' && psql -U postgres -c 'create database gesundheit_test'
